name: Ami-Tower
description:
2022/11/02

- finished game menu

- we can now change difficulty of game

EASY: normal speed, easy platforms

NORMAL: normal speed, short platforms

HARD: high speed, short platforms

 - end of game is on the 1000 floor

 - we can music off

 - added better background in game

What must I yet writing:

 - high score

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2022/10/31

This is a port of Icy Tower written in Blitz Basic 2 for Amiga.

 - levels are making randomly

 - we can jumping over 2 platforms and then we have more points to score and bonus jumping

 - on every 50 platforms time to end game is restoring, so we must possibly fast jumping to up

Controls: 

LEFT ARROW

RIGHT ARROW

SPACE

Game require a stock Amiga 500 with kick 1.3 and 500 kB fast/slow RAM.

Game is still work in progress.

 What is yet to finish written this game:

 - end of game (limit platforms)

 - game menu (options and highscore)
